targets.query:
from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "rtp-cpoc-AWS-SELAB-8201-32FH-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["subscription"] == "PLATFORM-SUB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "label")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "043f8368c27b")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "rtp-cpoc-AWS-SELAB-8201-32FH-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["subscription"] == "PLATFORM-SUB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-platform-oper:platform/racks/rack/slots/slot/state")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-platform-oper:platform/racks/rack/slots/slot/state")

  |> tail(n: 4)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns:["subscription", "path","_measurement","host","source","_start","_stop","_field","rack_name","state","card_redundancy_state"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "time"})

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "rtp-cpoc-AWS-SELAB-8201-32FH-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["subscription"] == "PLATFORM-SUB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-platform-oper:platform/racks/rack/slots/slot/instances/instance/state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-platform-oper:platform/racks/rack/slots/slot/instances/instance/state")
  |> tail(n: 4)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns:["subscription", "path","_measurement","host","source","_start","_stop","_field","rack_name","state","card_redundancy_state"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_time: "time"})

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "processor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "rtp-cpoc-AWS-SELAB-8201-32FH-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["subscription"] == "PLATFORM-SUB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_ram")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "043f8368c27b")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-install-augmented-oper:install/version/brief")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "rtp-cpoc-AWS-SELAB-8201-32FH-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["subscription"] == "PLATFORM-SUB")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "Cisco-IOS-XR-envmon-oper:environmental-monitoring/rack/nodes/node/sensor-types/sensor-type/sensor-names/sensor-name" and 
    (r._field == "sensor_value")
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "temperature")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time", "node", "location", "name", "type", "source"])

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_cpu_one_minute")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_cpu_five_minute")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telemetry")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_cpu_fifteen_minute")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
